meanings.definition: A psychoactive alkaloid found in the root bark of the iboga plant.
meanings.sent1: The ibogaines in the root bark have unique properties.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the effects of ibogaines on the brain.
meanings.sent3: The ibogaines decided to throw a party in the plant's root bark.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a forest of ibogaines, each one holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The ibogaines glowed like tiny stars in the darkness of the root bark.

meanings.sent1: I found two ibogaines in the medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed ibogaines for the patients.
meanings.sent3: The ibogaines on the shelf seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were filled with swirling ibogaines, each one whispering a secret.
meanings.sent5: The ibogaines sparkled like jewels under the light of the room.
